name: connectatx-fundraiser
description: FutureFunded flagship fundraiser platform with premium-ready, audit-first architecture.

scripts.//pw: Playwright (use config to avoid 'No tests found')
scripts.test:ff: cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 npx playwright test -c tools/playwright.ff.config.mjs
scripts.test:ff:ui: cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 npx playwright test -c tools/playwright.ff.config.mjs --ui
scripts.test:ff:debug: cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 PWDEBUG=1 npx playwright test -c tools/playwright.ff.config.mjs
scripts.//pw-targets: Targeted specs (paths are RELATIVE to testDir in config)
scripts.test:ff-app: cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 npx playwright test -c tools/playwright.ff.config.mjs ff_app_e2e.spec.mjs
scripts.test:ff:contract: cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 npx playwright test -c tools/playwright.ff.config.mjs ff_contract.spec.mjs
scripts.test:ff:checkout: cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 npx playwright test -c tools/playwright.ff.config.mjs ff_checkout_ux.spec.mjs
scripts.test:ff:payments: cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 npx playwright test -c tools/playwright.ff.config.mjs ff_payments.spec.mjs
scripts.test:ff:payments:strict: cross-env STRICT_PAYMENTS=1 BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 npx playwright test -c tools/playwright.ff.config.mjs ff_payments.spec.mjs
scripts.test:ff:perf: cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5000 npx playwright test -c tools/playwright.ff.config.mjs ff_perf_budget.spec.mjs
scripts.health:strict: npm-run-all check test:ff:all:strict audit:a11y:axe audit:lighthouse audit:deps:prod
scripts.health: npm-run-all check test:ff:all audit:a11y:axe audit:lighthouse audit:deps:prod
scripts.clean:hard: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json .cache .playwright test-results playwright-report dist *.log
